Name: Bugs
Description:
"Bugs" is a tactical-level wargame with six asymmetrical factions that models episodes in the lives of various insect species. In addition, this game system is designed to include new expansions, where factions of other phyla can be introduced, for example: reptiles.
The rules weight can vary, being suitable to a broad range of ages and war game knowledge, so it can be played by both children who are learning to count (4+) and more experienced wargamers.
In educational terms, this game aims to alert the community to the difficulties that animals face every day, and will increasingly face thanks to global warming. The game has a mechanic that simulates, by increasing the difficulty, possible future scenarios in which food is scarce, and weather conditions will be less favorable.

—description from the designer

Name: Tintura
Description:
Tintura is a family game for 2-6 players,for ages 8+  and +20 min in which you will have to get the colors to dye the clothes and get dressed first.
You have to get the dyes to be able to dress in a garment of each type, top, bottom and a complement. It doesn't matter if it's stained.
The game ends when a player get the 3 clothes and the one with the most points wins.

—description from the designer

Name: Mini Rogue: Wolf & Forge Promo cards
Description:
Wolf & Forge are two promo cards for Mini Rogue, packaged together.

     The Wolf is a loyal companion, this card will help you during combat. 
     The Forge can be useful to gain experience and build armor.


The base game is required to play these. They were originally released at Essen 2021.

Name: Les Jeux Olympiques
Description: The Olympic Games is a card game similar to belote. By winning tricks, you progress on different tracks which represent events (high jump, 100 meters, long jump, marathon...).

Name: Sobek: 2 Players – Treasures of the Pharaoh
Description:
Les Trésors du Pharaon ("The Pharaoh's Treasures") features the new, highly sought-after Pharaoh tiles to add on the Market board. These extraordinary items stand out for their value, of course, but also for their versatility, as they can be used in sets of either of the 2 depicted goods. However, they also come with Corruption, so think twice before you leap on them…

This expansion also includes 2 new Characters tiles and 2 new Pirogue tokens.

—description from the publisher

Name: Chicken-Fox-Snake
Description:
It is a board game between two players on either side of a board.

Each pawn moves 3 squares horizontally and/or vertically, if a pawn ends up on a square with an opposing pawn it can capture it if it meets the following conditions: the chicken eats the snake, the snake eats the fox, the fox eat the chicken.

The first player to capture 4 pawns wins.

Name: After the Empire: Tower Walls Promo Card
Description:
Originally available as part of Pack C from the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

Promo card that allows you to take 1 fewer damage from archery

Name: Almanac: Tom's Hat Promo Card
Description:
Originally available as part of Pack E from the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

"The ground begins to shake as a hat-wearing giant emerges from a nearby canyon. In a booming voice, he says, "Hey everybody. who wants to play a game?" Tom the giant challenges the merchants to a toss of the dice."

Can be used with Almanac: The Crystal Peaks and Almanac: The Dragon Road

Name: Stwory z Obory: Wielkie Nordobicie
Description:
Are barns and forests deserted and all highroads trod? Are there no beasts on the horizon cuz they were slaughtered in a hundred ways? Do you laze around watching the sack full of coins? Soon enough you will be awaken by fall breeze from north!

Take out your disguises, sharpen the pitchfork and ... watch out for the arrows in the knee! Here comes the Wielkie Nordobicie ("Grand North-brawl"), an expansion to Stwory z Obory (Beasts from the Barn) - original Polish party card game with black humour.

Wielkie Nordobicie contains 54 cards filled with Nordic mythology. Video games fans will also notice some easter eggs, eg. Wrzaski Mocy {Power Yells) or strzaÅ‚ w kolano (arrow in the knee). In this expansion you'll once again find characteristic Tomasz Bolik's arts.

This expansion adds new mechanics, eg. 6-players game, weapons and stuff crafting and temporary alliances in order to fight might Giants.

Wielkie Nordobicie is a perfect gift for teenagers looking for negative interaction party game with specific humour and for all those lovers of Stwory z Oboory.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Name: Aeronautica Imperialis: Wings of Vengeance – Emperor's Blessing Card
Description:
Card found in Issue 470 of the magazine White Dwarf.

Marauder 'Ace' Payload: A single Marauder Bomber or Marauder Destroyer may purchase this ace for +4 points. Once per game, when firing its Bomb Bay weapon, the aircraft may add 4 to the FPR characteristic.

Name: Lineup
Description:
The Lineup is set and it’s time for you to identify your friends!

In Lineup, you’ll be asking the group questions that have a numeric answer. Then, you’ll create a lineup of your friends based on how you think they’ve answered! The most accurate predictor wins!

Lineup is based off the smash-hit CUT show with over 1.2 billion views to date!

—description from the publisher

Name: Unlocked
Description:
You might keep secrets but
Your phone knows the truth.

By the end of the night, we’ll all be better friends after sharing things we never thought we would…like Netflix passwords.

Drink up, it’s time to unlock the dirty truth.

In Unlocked players take turns pulling cards and either asking questions or proposing dares to the group. Each round there will be one winner declared who will receive the card as a point. At the end of play, the player with the most points wins.

—description from the publisher

Name: Family Meme Night
Description:
From the creators of What Do You Meme?

Match the funniest caption to the photo to make your own Meme!

The goal of Family Meme Night is to win the most Photo Cards by coming up with the funniest Caption Card/Photo Card combos. The target number of Photo Cards needed to win varies by the number of players.

Name: The Final Light-Year: The Mira Sector
Description:
February 2022 episode for The Final Light-Year.

This kit adds a new sector map, new overlord, minion and commander, and a new crew member.


Released in the February 2022 Board Game of the Month Club $5+ package.

Name: AdvanceQuest: The New Hill
Description:
The quiet village of Berryside isn't known for adventure... but that's about to change. Steel yourself to face the mysterious threat that dwells inside The New Hill.

AdvanceQuest is a compact adventure system. Generate a character with any traits you want, and advance your way through the story, rolling dice against challenges and trying to reach the end.

A new chapter in the AdvanceQuest story is coming.

Using a clever new exploration mechanic, each foray into the story will offer different challenges using a simple combination of two elements. Select two of your own traits and roll off against the two story elements, and see if you can beat the dangerous situation. If you roll well, you survive to continue on. If you fail, you will take damage. But don't despair – you can spend Stamina to re-roll dice before you apply their effects! If you can make it through the story, you win! Your score is how many treasures you manage to collect along the way – see if you can beat your high score by playing again!

In The New Hill you will protect the village of Berryside from ravenous insect creatures that are attacking the town and all who inhabit it. This is the second AdvanceQuest adventure.

—description from the publisher


A solo micro-game designed by C.C. Chamberlin, based on Dungeon Hero. Create a hero using eight defining characteristics, like Archer of the Realm or Chainmail or Stealthy.  Assign them dice ranging from d12 to d6. Note your Health and Stamina levels, and then start the adventure.

Name: UeStop!
Description:
UeStop! is an exciting competitive word game for 2-6 player, where players test their knowledge and their reflex, struggling to be the first one to find the correct word with the correct letter.

The game is played in turns and in each turn there is a card with one of the four possible colors (green, yellow, red, blue), also showing 4 categories on four edges of the card and 4 different letters in the middle of the card. These 4 letters are presented in colored bubbles, matching the colors of the cards.

After all the players have read the categories and are ready, another card is opened and then, the players will try to be the first one to put their hand over the card and say one word with the starting letter indicated on the colored bubble of the second card that matches the color of the first card.

If the player answers correctly, she gains the card as a reward worth one point. Another turn starts and the game continues until any player gets 5 points.

This is the basic to play UeStop!, but the game also contains 3 new game modes that will challenge the players with new rules and adding strategy to the gameplay.

—description from the designer

Name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers – War of the Realms Booster Brick
Description:
Be the Mightiest in All of the Realms!

Thor and the Avengers take on Malekith and other Asgardian threats!

Based on the realms-shattering The War of the Realms event, this HeroClix set combines some of the coolest Thor stuff with the hottest game play of the year!

This 5-figure booster release features fan-favorite characters like Thor, Captain America, Mary Jane, Gamora, Wasp, Angela, Yondu, Nova, Black Widow, and more!
Avengers The War of the Realms has more characters with RALLY that was first introduced in X-Men Rise and Fall earlier this year as well as brand-new mechanics like Recruiter!

MISSION POINTS make a triumphant return, and players will unlock all-new ways to win!

Shifting Focus is back too, so players will get to plays many versions of their favorite characters!

Also find brand new “Legacy” cards for figures that might already be in your collection!

—description from the publisher

Name: MimocirQ
Description:
Greatly inspired by the Cirque du Soleil imagery, MimocirQ brings you irresistable cards featuring a cast of zany characters in dazzling colours!

To collect the most sets of three identical cards, you will need to make the facial expression of body position shown on the wanted card.

Sounds easy? Try it and see... without bursting into laughing.

Name: Serial Killer: Second Edition
Description:
Serial Killer 2nd Edition is a 4-50 players bluffing and hidden role game.

In Victorian era, surrounded by crime and suspicion, the citizens and police must find and arrest the killers before blood of the innocents are spread everywhere in the city.

When the game begins, the Serial Killer can "kill" other people by secretly sending the signal (eg. touching, nudging, winking etc.) And whenever a player receives the signal, He/She must die and be eliminated. However, If  a Police is eliminated, It's time to find the Serial Killer(s)! the remaining players must discuss and vote for elimination. The Citizen team wins when all Serial Killers are eliminated. In contrast, the Criminal team wins when the number of Serial Killer(s) equals to half of the remaining players, or all Police and Detectives are eliminated.

Name: Pizza Master Revised Edition
Description:
Pizza Master Revised Edition is a 2-5 players strategy game.

Each player is a trainee in the “Pizza Wizard” to prove themselves worthy of “The Next Pizza Master” title.

Pizza Master starts by taking orders from customers, buying, and stocking up on quality ingredients for your dishes. However, every trainee works in the same kitchen. So if you have your eye on you may be snatched up by other trainees at any time! And you will be punished for any leftover! Finally, The player with the most reputation points wins the title of “The Pizza Master”

Pizza Master Revised Edition has the new rule to easier understand, expanded menu, and more daunting challenges. Moreover, the kitchen has been renovated for the exciting showdown!

—description from the publisher

Name: 27 Metres
Description:
27 Metres, a party game for 2-6 players, taking place in space, the hundreds of kilometers above the earth.

An unexpected event happened in space station. The large space debris has crashed, and we need to perform maintenance. Unfortunately, there is the cable tether with a length of only 27 meters left. Fatal mission which everyone must take turns releasing cable to send people to repair the station by putting a card which indicates the length of the cable that has been released. Then, draw a card from your deck and show it to everyone before putting it into your hand. There is no room for error, any actions causing the cable to break will result in disciplinary actions from the captain and suspension.

Tower Tactic Games (The Stronghold) collaborates with Thai game designer who creates Cabbage Farm and The Coding. Along with the same illustrator from Tan-staR as Serial Killer. 27 Metres is the first game from Solar Crisis Series that is easy to play for players of all ages.

Name: Escape Adventures Adventskalender:  Die geheimnisvolle Burg
Description:
It is cold. Snow melts on the skin. Winter has come. Suddenly you find yourself in an ice-blue world full of knights, alchemists and long-forgotten creatures. Start your story on December 1 and behind each door find out which door you need to open next. The mystery of sabotaged festivities and an ancient castle are waiting to be explored. Riddles must be solved and shady items like Rubik's cubes or puzzle pieces must be combined to reach the end of the story. Will you find the exit to escape the Escape Room by Christmas? Find out!

-description by the publisher
Families: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

Name: Half Match
Description:
Are you brave enough to make a monster? Make monster matches by describing your half monster and collecting the matching half from other players. The cards can be used in a variety of other ways
to strengthen expressive language, listening, and memory skills while having fun!

The player with the most matches, wins.

Name: Warhammer 40,000 (Ninth Edition): Codex – Adeptus Custodes
Description:
The Adeptus Custodes are demigods of war, sworn to defend the Emperor to their last breath. In this dark and dangerous age, that mission compels them away from Holy Terra and out into the stars, for no longer can they stand upon the ramparts of the Imperial Palace and watch the galaxy burn. They are the most elite warriors in the Imperium, clad in auramite armour and wielding some of the finest weapons ever created by Mankind. Whether teleporting into the heart of battle, storming to war aboard ancient Land Raiders or streaking through the skies astride Dawneagle jetbikes, the Custodians are death incarnate to their enemies. Alongside them fight the Sisters of Silence, a secretive order of psychic blanks to whom falls the task of protecting the Imperium from rogue psykers and sorcerers. Together, they are the Talons of the Emperor, and where they take to the field no foe of the Emperor can stop them.

This mighty tome contains pages of background and rules dedicated to the Emperor's most elite guardians – the Adeptus Custodes. Discover the history and hierarchy of the Talons of the Emperor, and the legendary heroes that have stood by the Emperor's side for over 10,000 years, as well as the myriad ways they wage war in Terra's name.

Inside the 104-page hardback book, you'll find:

     In-depth background and lore on the Adeptus Custodes and the Sisters of Silence, who make up the Talons of the Emperor, plus information about War Zone: Terra, where the Custodes battle insidious threats
     Exquisite art that exemplifies the deific nature of these unparalleled warriors
     All the rules you need to play your Adeptus Custodes army, including 20 datasheets covering every unit from the brand new Blade Champion to the Custodian Guard and Prosecutors
     A full suite of rules for playing Crusade and narrative games, including Agendas, Battle Traits, Requisitions, Crusade Relics, plus Battle Scars, and Artefacts of the Vault Relics unique to the Adeptus Custodes
     An 'Eavy Metal miniatures showcase including variant Adeptus Custodes colour schemes


—description from the publisher

Name: Trash-TV: Promis, Pannen, Peinlichkeiten
Description:
"I’m only in this for the money“, „I don’t have photograph for you today“ and dramatic slo-mo of tearstruck faces – you know what that‘s about: Common phrases and events from reality TV (or lovingly called „Trash-TV“).

Created by Trash-TV expert @anredo this game serves as a companion for most reality tv shows, where you play along to find out who can get rid of the most cards. Whenever a quote or event happens on the show or at home in your living room, that you just happen to have on one of your cards, you may get rid of that card.
Examples include "someone uses a sob story about a bad relationship with one of their family members" or "someone adjust the volume on your device at home".

The player who manages to get rid of all their cards first wins. If at the end of the show no one managed to lose all their cards, the player with the fewest cards wins.

Name: Escape Adventures Adventskalender: Die verwunschenen Eisruinen
Description:
Probably the most exciting Advent season ever! Join adventurer Edda on the greatest journey of discovery of his life. 
You have only 24 days to find the exit with Eddas faithful companions Spike and Luna, trapped in an underground ice ruin. Manage your rations well, open doors and deactivate frosty traps to get closer to escape. Meet mystical creatures, icy sculptures and solve a mystery of a long forgotten culture every day.
Families: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

Name: EscapeBox: Virus
Description:
EscapeBox is a board game that provides you with an exciting escape room experience. You can think with your friends, family or co-workers, put together clues, find a way out of the predicament you are in, and complete your mission. You do not have a simple task ahead! You have to be focused and precise.  Even things that seem very trivial may help you.  Be aware of time!  You do not have much time to complete this mission.

Virus is the name of your first mission. The world needs your help to prevent a human catastrophe.  To succeed in this mission, you have to overcome many challenges and obstacles.  You and your teammates must be able to decipher many locks by solving various puzzles. You only have 75 minutes to save humanity.

Name: 24 Days Escape: 3D-Adventskalender – Sherlock Holmes und das Anwesen Moriarty
Description:
Are you brave enough to embark on a mysterious adventure? Then brace yourself and enter the Moriarty estate. The 24 DAYS ESCAPE Advent Calendar ensures an exciting Advent season not only for Sherlock Holmes fans. This special Advent calendar consists of 24 doors with an exciting story, 24 puzzles and mysterious objects as well as the 3D mansion of Professor Moriarty - arch enemy of Sherlock Holmes - to set up and explore. Solve the puzzles around the mysterious mansion and find all the mysterious items to solve the big master puzzle on December 24th.

- description by the publisher
Families: Misc: Advent / Christmas / Jule calendar game

Name: Auf der Hut
Description:
In Auf Der Hut, you want to be on guard to what others are doing so that you spot the right hats on the right people.

To set up, shuffle the character deck and the hat deck separately, then lay out a row of seven face-up characters (princess, jester, knight, witch, etc.) with a face-down hat card above each character. On a turn, take one of three actions:


    Peek at a hat card, then put it back.
    Swap two hat cards without looking at them.
    Reveal a hat card that you think matches the character below it. Is the cowboy hat on the cowboy's head, the Viking helmet on the Viking, or more generally, did you make a match? Great! Take this character and their hat, place them in front of you, then draw a new character from the deck and place a face-down hat card above it. If you revealed one of the four wonder hats, then you've made a match, but you claim only the wonder hat, replacing it with a face-down hat card. If you failed to make a match, you flip the hat card face down again and take a bald head card as a penalty.


When you can't refill a spot in the display, the game ends. For each bald head you have, you must cover a hat on a character you collected — but for each wonder hat you have, you can adorn someone who has been stricken with instantaneous hair loss. Whoever has collected the most hats wins!

Name: Escape the Box: Die verschwundenen Superhelden
Description: This box transforms into nine rooms - not just one Escape Room, but an entire Superhero Tower stands between you and your Exit. And what is it? The base of the superheroes seems to be abandoned. Time for new heroes to prove themselves. Find the missing heroes and escape the big Escape Room together. Solve all the puzzles and uncover the secrets of the fastest and strongest people in the world to master the mission of your game characters. With up to four players, you'll explore the Heroes' Union base, filled with dangerous artifacts, captured supervillains and alien technology. But don't let the villains hoodwink you. Who knows who is responsible for the disappearance of the superheroes?

Name: Meadow: Downstream
Description:
Meadow: Downstream is an expansion for Meadow inspired by the fascinating nature of aquatic environments. Start a new journey to observe flora, fauna and landscapes connected with rivers, streams and lakes. Go kayaking down the river and compete with others on the new fields of exploration.

Meadow: Downstream includes over 80 new cards depicting wildlife living in an aquatic environment and a new thematic envelope to discover. Kayaking mechanism allows players to score extra points for progressing down the river. Adjust the level of competition with two-sided river board. Choose between a fast stream and calm river to explore two faces of nature.

—description from the publisher

Name: Dominion: Seaside (Second Edition)
Description:
Dominion: Seaside is an expansion to both Dominion and Dominion: Intrigue. As such, it does not contain material for a complete game.

From the back of the box: "All you ask is a tall ship and a star to steer her by. And someone who knows how to steer ships using stars. You finally got some of those rivers you'd wanted, and they led to the sea. These are dangerous, pirate-infested waters, and you cautiously send rat-infested ships across them, to establish lucrative trade at far-off merchant-infested ports. First, you will take over some islands, as a foothold. The natives seem friendly enough, crying their peace cries, and giving you spears and poison darts before you are even close enough to accept them properly. When you finally reach those ports you will conquer them, and from there you will look for more rivers.

One day, all the rivers will be yours."

Dominion: Seaside (Second Edition) contains nine new types of Kingdom cards, which will be released on their own as an update pack for those who own the first edition of this expansion. A few cards will receive minor errata, but these will not appear in the update pack.

Name: Prometheus
Description:
A 2-player abstract game played on a chess-style board, where opposing pieces (of three distinct kinds: cubes, pyras and tetras) seek to win by capturing the fourth and leader piece of each army: the sphere.

Each piece moves exactly as many squares as it has corners: tetras move three squares, pyras five and cubes eight. No pieces can be jumped, but pieces are captured when an opposing piece ends its' move on the same square. When a sphere is captured, the game is over.

Name: Marvel Zombies: A Zombicide Game – Hydra Resurrection
Description:
As the chaos between living and zombie heroes rages on, the Red Skull attempts to seize power by commanding a legion of zombie Hydra Troops. Well trained and well armed, this horde will pose a threat to Super Heroes and Zombie Heroes alike.

Red Skull is a unique Enemy spawn that can be added to any Mission, although this expansion does feature several of its own, for both game modes! When spawned, he will make use of his unique Action deck, which dictates the special actions he will perform each time he activates.

The six tiles contained in this expansion recreate a different location on each of their sides. On one side is the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and on the other side is the Hydra base. Additional  Super Heroes, Zombie Heroes, and Bystanders can also be added to any game of Marvel Zombies.

–description from the publisher

Name: Air Scarmush: Tactical Flight Contest
Description:
A 'hybrid board/app' tactical air combat game for two players that runs on a 'simultaneous turn by turn' basis over a board of hexagons. (Print n' Play)

This unique system allows you to apprehend the flow of an air engagement (dogfight) in a dynamic and realistic way. Hands on throttle-and-stick, you manoeuver to get into your opponent's six, or to get out of the pursuit! It's a duel of minds in which the most experienced pilot will certainly win.

A bomber is not able to turn its nose as fast as a fighter and the latter does not have the same turn rate at different airspeeds. In this game, each aircraft has a specific flight model (energy management chart) which you can study to integrate its strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, the resolution of offensive actions takes into account the actual position/attitude of the planes and evasive manoeuvres to determine success.

The app contains the game manual, the scenarios, a link to the pdf document to print and shape and the user interface to easily select and present your choices.

Each game turn represents 8 seconds of flight time, which allows complex manoeuvres such as Immelmann, Split S, High yo-yo or Barrel rolls to be performed in sequence.

The game features 20 skirmish scenarios (involving up to 8 airplanes) that include air-to-air and/or air-to-ground objectives, 5 aircraft types (fighter, interceptor, ground attack, bomber, transport) and 11 weapon/action types (cannon, missiles, bombs, countermeasures,...). Each scenario offers a number of points to be won by each team, the one that has won the most points wins the battle.

-description from the publisher

Name: Towering Purrfection
Description: You have stumbled upon an abandoned warehouse overrun with playful and pleasant cats. Your task is to turn the warehouse into a sanctuary for your cats to climb and play in. You will each utilize colorful tiles and cat trees to turn the warehouse into a bright, cozy environment for your cats to climb and enjoy. You are in charge of the renovation, so each tower build is unique to its designer—but remember, these cats accept nothing but purrfection.

Name: Mythic Mayhem: Forge of Heroes
Description:
Mythic Mayhem: Forge of Heroes is the core game release from the Mythic Mayhem saga. A battle card game with heroes like Rangar the Barbarian and Kieran Darkheart the Wizard, among others. There are 87 unique cards with a total of 250 playing cards within the deck, perfectly balanced for play for 2+! Some cards are rarer to have in your hand than others, so play them wisely!

This card game has one sole purpose, to play! We took all the elements of the most popular trading card games and made it simple and affordable for anyone to start playing. You do not need to know complicated deck building systems or spend hundreds of dollars on trying to get the best cards. Perfect for playing with friends or family, anyone can learn quickly. All the cards needed to play the game are within the game box!

Mythic Mayhem challenges and changes the definition of trading card gaming. Recently, there has been a disconnect between collectors and players and this game brings everyone together. With exceptional art, holographic legendary cards, and smooth game mechanics we hope to reach as many players as possible!

There are Heroes, spells, attacks, defense cards, and more! This is a game of skill, strategy, and chance. We are dedicated to the creation of a smooth, entertaining, and intriguing game that can be played round after round with various outcomes!

Setup

1.  Shuffle the cards; Place all cards face down, instant cards and battle cards in separate decks 
  2.  Each player starts with 20 life points
  3.  Each player draws 8 cards from the battle deck
  4.  Each player rolls the die. The highest roll starts; turns go in clockwise order

Details

1.  One card can be played per turn, unless otherwise stated on specific card
  2.  Cannot heal for more than starting life points, unless otherwise stated on specific card 
  3.  A card can be played toward any opponent, unless otherwise stated on specific card
  4.  Cards are played face up in front of the player until the card mechanics have played out; then discard card to the graveyard
  5.  Defense cards can be played anytime to defend against damage if the defense card is a reaction; otherwise, it is played for turn; A defense 
      reaction does not count for turn
  6.  One defense card can be active per player
  7.  If defending, any remaining damage not defended is taken
  8.  Instant cards must be played at time of pulling; instant card effects and damage cannot be blocked
  9.  A player cannot draw an instant card two turns in a row
  10. Instant cards have a separate playing deck and graveyard than all other cards
  11. If a player uses all 8 cards in their hand; add 2 life points and redraw 8 cards
  12. If there are no available cards in the battle deck or instant deck, shuffle all of the graveyard cards, and place face down to continue the 
      game

Let's Play!

For turn, choose one of the following options

1. Play a damage, defense, or spell card
OR
   2. Draw and play an instant card
OR
   3. Discard 1 card from your hand to the graveyard and draw two cards from the battle deck for your hand

To Win

Deplete all opponents' life points

Name: Forbidden Brews
Description: You drop the final ingredient into your bubbling cauldron, and see the colors shift as your brew is complete. This potion could make you a pretty penny, even more so since the King outlawed them. You hear a knock at your door, increasing in tempo—the King’s Guard! In this press-your-luck deck builder, players attempt to brew powerful potions while avoiding the King’s Guard in order to collect the most fame and become the greatest witch in all the land! Potion Commotion will be released after Towering Purrfection, so keep an eye out in the future for more news about this dangerously magical deck builder.

Name: Bear Stare Down: Parks Expansion
Description: This Parks themed expansion includes 20 cards that can be used to expand your Bear Stare Down game to add 2 more players. Simply add this expansion to the base deck.

Name: フラグのいけにえ (Flag no Ikenie)
Description:
ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã®ã„ã‘ã«ãˆ (Flag no Ikenie) is a bluffing and deduction game from Japan.

The game title refers to a character in a movie who is marked for death (flag sacrifice). Like the cop on the last day before retirement, or the young woman hearing a noise in the cellar. You know they are going to get it, you just don't know how.

In the game, these characters are hidden as Prey cards, and players are the villains in horror movies, hunting them. Player hunt by put numbered cards against the Prey cards to reveal them. Cards are played in sequence, and if the total is 6, the player may check the card to see if it is their own target. At 10, the card is revealed to all.

Each hunter has a special ability that helps them catch their targets. But the prey characters also have special skills to resist the hunter and slip away.

The first player to catch two of their targets is the winner.
user summary

Name: Thunder Road: Vendetta – Extra Ammo Mini-Expansion Pack
Description:
Sometimes you just need a little more firepower. Extra Ammo is a deck of bonus mini-expansions for your game. As we unlock more stretch goals, the ammo box gets bigger. And the best part? It's free to all backers who get the game (base or Maximum Chrome edition).

Road Conditions - We race rain or shine! Global effects that impact racers on each road board.
(Blockaded, Guardrails, Marauders, Sand Storm, Slick Roads, Torrential Downpour, Tremors, Windy)

Advanced Airstrikes - Bonus effects for your chopper. Keep one eye on the road and one on the sky.
(Air-to-Air Missile, Bag of Wrenches, Care Package, Discerning Pilot, Dual Guns, Low Flying, Scouting Mission, Strafing Run, Target Practice, Trick Shot)

One Shots - Potent, one-use abilities. Choosing precisely the right time to flip the switch on your flux capacitor can mean the difference between winning and dying.
(AI Danger Avoidance, Camouflage Coating, Flux Capacitor, Grapeshot, Guided Missile, Sonar Array)

Bonus Commands - Extra command board options to choose from, wisely.
(Hands-Free, Nav System, Positraction, Rapid Reload, Rocket Fuel, Targeting AI, Tire Spikes, Torque Booster)

Bounties - Hidden personal achievements that offer an immediate, powerful effect.
(Down and Dirty, Hit and Run, Pinball Wizard, Rubbing is Racing, Slow and Steady)

(17 more, total 54 cards)

Name: Thunder Road: Vendetta – Maximum Chrome
Description:
This edition puts all of the game play extras in one big, foil-stamped box:

     Base Game
     Big Rig and the Final 5
     Carnage at Devil's Run
     Choppe Shoppe
     Extra Ammo


Plus:

     Custom plastic insert
     Stretch Goals
     Exclusive Crew Leader Em Berco
     Exclusive mini-expansion German Engineering
     Exclusive consolidated rulebook


(From update #13):
Maximum Chrome includes the base game and all three expansions: ''Big Rig & the Final 5'', ''Carnage at Devil's Run'', and ''Choppe Shoppe''. It includes the ''Extra Ammo'' mini-expansion pack. It also includes three items only available in this edition. The German Engineering mini-expansion offers a new way to play, replacing the movement and shooting dice with a hand of cards. The Em Berco crew leader mixes features from Choppe Shoppe and Carnage for a blazing good time. And you also get a consolidated rulebook that incorporates the rules for all the game content in one place with appropriate cross-references for ease of use. And it all comes stored in a custom plastic insert to hold everything in place and a foil-stamped box that looks extra swanky.

Maximum Chrome will not be going into retail distribution.

Addendum: It's been confirmed the insert will be card-sleeve-friendly.

Name: Cursus Honorum
Description:
In Cursus Honorum you lead your patrician family on a path to power, by occupying all offices in the progression of importance.

Roll your dice and move one of your family members according the number rolled. If it is on the right position, it can stop family members of your opponents.

If you are the first to get one of your family members to "Imperator", the game ends and you win.

—user summary

Published on History Kids, italian edition, issue #9.

Name: Before the First Emperor
Description:
The game takes place over the five hundred years of "Spring and Autumn Period" and "Warring States Period" in ancient China, before the power structure of old age undergone total collapse and the world was eventually taken over by the First Emperor of Qin.

Before the First Emperor is a euro-style game developed around two core mechanisms of "selective worker placement" and "variable resource generation". Players are provided with multiple paths to victory.

In their turn, each player can place workers on one of the 12 action spaces on the main board and perform the corresponding actions, or place them in their own Domain tiles to generate resources. They can also fulfil contracts and use special powers as free actions.

After 8 to 10 rounds the game comes to a conclusion. Players sum up points gained from their contracts, Virtue Tracks, Provinces, Fiefs, office buildings and the King's Favours to determine who's the First Emperor.
Families: History: Warring States Period of China

Name: Roll Camera!: Flip Table Promo Card
Description: A “no color” scene card that does not contribute toward the script, but gains you that extra $1 as compensation. Guest staring Itchy Feet Guy.

Name: Quiznight: Mädelsabend – RUBBELN, RÄTSELN, RATEN
Description:
You are just quiztastic and looking for a varied program for your hen party or want to spice up the next girls' night a bit? Then get this quiz game for a unique experience.

Exciting questions on funny categories await you here to put your knowledge to the test and challenge the other girls. Scratch the questions, win the mini-games, and get your brain in gear. Who knows more, who's faster - who comes out the winner?  Categories include: Literature, Celebrities, Art, Nutrition & Sport, World of Fashion, Surprise.

Playable as a single player or in a team - for 2 to 20 players with creative decoration and recipe ideas, invitation cards and Spotify playlist for an unforgettable evening.

Players win by answering more questions correctly and solving more puzzles than their adversaries!

-description by the publisher

Name: Quiznight: Männerrunde – RUBBELN, RÄTSELN, RATEN
Description:
You are all-quizzing and want to prove your quizzing thirst at the next men's round?

This unique quiz game is guaranteed to make for a unique evening with the guys. The quiz will challenge you and put your knowledge to the test in a variety of categories.  Scratch the questions, win the mini-games and get your brain in high gear. Who knows more, who is faster - who will leave the game as the winner? Categories include: Politics, culture, sports, spirits, science, surprise.

Playable as single players or in teams - for 2 to 20 players with creative decoration and recipe ideas, invitation cards and Spotify playlist for an unforgettable evening.

Players win by answering more questions correctly and solving more puzzles than their adversaries!

-description by the publisher

Name: Quiznight: Familienabend – RUBBELN, RÄTSELN, RATEN
Description:
You are sure of victory in the quiz and your next family evening should be a special experience!

With this unique quiz night you can quiz your knowledge, because the quiz game puts young and old to the test. Scratch the questions free and challenge yourself in a variety of categories. The exciting mini-games will really get your brain working! Which team knows more, who is faster - who comes out the winner? Categories include: Animals, Fairy tales, Superheroes, Food & Drink, The World, Surprise.

Playable as single players or in teams - for 2 to 20 players with creative decoration and recipe ideas, invitation cards and Spotify playlist for an unforgettable evening.

Players win by answering more questions correctly and solving more puzzles than their adversaries!

-description by the publisher

Name: Quiznight: Partytime – RUBBELN, RÄTSELN, RATEN
Description:
Use your insider quizzing skills, scratch the questions free and put your knowledge to the test in creative and nerdy categories.

Exciting mini-games, fast-paced quick question rounds and exciting guessing questions await you. Who knows more, who is faster - who comes out the winner? Categories include: Movies & Series, Stars & Starlets, Computer Games & Comics, Spirits, History, Surprise.

Playable as a single player or in a team - for 2 to 20 players with creative decoration and recipe ideas, invitation cards and Spotify playlist for an unforgettable evening.

Players win by answering more questions correctly and solving more puzzles than their adversaries!

-description by the publisher

Name: Fruddel Muddel
Description:
Do red bananas feel as blue as yellow strawberries?! Anyone who plays Fruddel Muddel must overlook the muddle of colors in front of them to grab the right fruit.

To set up, deal cards are evenly as possible to all players, then place the four fabric fruits — strawberry, banana, pear, and grapes — in the center of the playing area so that everyone can grab them easily.

Everyone then reveals a card simultaneously, and each card shows the silhouette of one of these four fruits, with an outline in the color of one of these four fruits on a colored background that matches one of these four fruits — which means that each card has elements of three different fruits or two elements of one fruit and one element of a second fruit. Your challenge is to figure out which fruit appears most frequently among all the signals given, then grab it from the center. Alternatively, if you don't want to grab something, place your hand on your deck of cards.

If you grabbed the proper fruit — and more than one might exist! — then you place your revealed card on the bottom of your deck. If you didn't grab a fruit, you discard your card, and if you grabbed the wrong fruit, discard your card and one additional card from your deck. Keep playing rounds until someone discards their final card, at which point whoever has the most cards left wins.

Name: Escape the Box: Der verfolgte Sherlock Holmes
Description:
Should the great Sherlock Holmes have fallen victim to one of his many enemies? For Watson and his companions, the search for the missing genius becomes their greatest case. A breathless chase through the foggy alleys of London begins, from mysterious crime scenes to behind the doors of secretive gentlemen's clubs. Can they uncover Moriarty's plot before it's too late?

Using dividers and floor cards, you'll transform the game boxes into a unique setting for your Sherlock Holmes mystery. Solve all the puzzles and unravel the secrets inside and outside the box to find the missing consulting detective. This Escape Room will show you if you have what it takes to take on the London underworld.

-description by the publisher

Name: Unboxing: Der Fluch des Seeungeheuers
Description:
Ahoy, you landlubbers! Dive into a bygone era full of robbery, rum and brawls. 
During a dive you discover a strange box on the seabed. You bring it onto your boat and try to open it. It turns out that there are a lot more secrets hidden inside than you first thought. With the help of a magic shell, you'll witness strange happenings on a pirate ship where little is as it seems. 
So it's all hands on deck: solve the riddles, listen carefully to the radio play and uncover the mystery, box by box.

-description by the publisher

Name: Ist da wer?!
Description:
Ist da wer?! is a hide-and-seek game in which attentive children need to recognize what cannot be seen.

The centerpiece of the game is a "thicket", that is, a large vertical container that represents a bunch of bushes. Inside this container are twenty wooden discs, two each of ten colors, and you can see these discs inside the thicket through 29 cut-out slots. However, the thicket is designed so that five of the discs will fall into grooves at the bottom of the vertical container, and the discs in these grooves will be hidden by a piece of cardboard underbrush so that they are not visible until you remove the underbrush during play. Ten animals in the colors of the discs are set up in the center of the playing area within reach of all players. Each player also has a stack of nine tiles that when placed together form a picture.

Each round, one player shakes the thicket face down so that no one can see which discs are going where, then they stand the thicket upright on the table. Everyone then grabs for the animals that they think are hiding in the underbrush, that is, the animals that can be seen only once through the cut-out slots — or possibly not seen at all.

Once everyone has grabbed all the animals that they wish to, remove the underbrush to see which animals are actually there. If you grabbed an animal that is in the underbrush, reveal one of your picture tiles, and if that animal is in the underbrush twice, reveal two picture tiles instead. If by mistake you grabbed an animal that is not in the underbrush, you must return a picture tile to the bottom of your stack. Keep playing rounds until one or more players have revealed all of their tiles, completed their picture, and won.

Name: OAKO
Description: OAKO is a 2 player strategy card game where players take, reveal, switch and place cards in order to take the highest number of points from the opponent.

Name: Квилт (Quilt)
Description:
So, each player is an unsurpassed master and will create a real work of art today, while earning as many victory points as possible. Quilt is a game for all family members, great for both beginners and experienced players who can enjoy finding a tactical game plan and making various combos.

The essence of the game:

     We pull out pencils from the bag and distribute them among the needle beds, and then take them apart for ourselves.
     We color, with the received pencils, the cells of our quilt.
     Activate chains of effects and collect bonuses.


It turned out to be an unusual logic game in a tempting warm cover.

Name: Unboxing: Das Geheimnis des Meisterdiebs
Description:
For almost ten years, a box lay unnoticed in your police station's evidence room. What is this strange box all about? Is it really from a master thief, as the lead detective claims? And what is really inside? Solve the riddles, listen carefully to the radio play and find out the secret, box by box.

-description by the publisher

Name: Sly Foxes
Description:
Sly Foxes is a super fun and highly strategic card game in which you have to outsmart the other players… ughm… I mean foxes! You can do that with the help of a hedgehog hug, nosy weasels, pouring vodka instead of water, giving long-forgotten cookies and many more! We don't have unicorns, explosions or kittens, but if you're into foxes, turtles, NINJA-DEER, rabbits, squirrels and other cute animals, then try this game!

The cards get separated into 2 decks - attack and defence cards. There are special cards too, like ‘I don't care’ which protects you against attacks and nosey weasels, who in turn interfere during other players' turns. In the beginning each player has 3 lives, gets 3 cards from each deck and a secret character that helps them in certain situations.

When it's your turn you either draw a card or attack a player of your choice. The player who eliminates everyone else wins the game and gets proclaimed the slyest fox in the woods. You can also play the game in teams and this makes it even more fun!

Name: Terra Mystica: Fan Factions
Description: A collection of 20 new factions for Terra Mystica, 2 each for the 7 colors of the game and 2 multi-color, ice and fire factions, respectively. All ideas submitted by fans of the game.

Name: Dicewar
Description:
What happens when a classic 5-dice game meets high-intensity action card play? A battle for the best roll. DICEWAR invigorates dice-rolling with a ground-breaking fervor and hostility that will make you forget everything you ever knew about dice.

Dicewar is a round-by-round competition to be the first player to reach 6 points. To have any chance at the win, players must balance strong dice-rolling with strategic action card playing.

2-5 players are given 3 rolls per round to achieve familiar dice combinations like Large Straight, 4-of-a-kind, and Full House. The player with the best roll at the end of a round wins a point AND and action card. With 10 different action card types, players can use cards to steal dice from their opponents, skip their opponents' turn, and even make their opponent "respect the ones".

—description from the designer

Name: Hitler's Stalingrad: Breslau 1945
Description:
After being cut off and isolated in mid-February 1945, the German garrison at Breslau, some 50,000 men, defied all odds holding onto the city for almost a week AFTER Berlin fell! Hitler had ordered the city be held at all costs, believing Soviet forces tied up there were thus not taking part in any assault on Berlin. The defending garrison finally surrendered just days before the war officially ended (with the Gauleiter in charge fleeing the city by air to escape capture).

Taking the city fell to the Soviet Sixth Army, comprised of some eight divisions with 80,000 men between them, plus four tank regiments and two artillery divisions. An entire Air Army, the Second, was also assigned to provide ample destructive power from the sky. The task facing the Soviets was daunting; urban warfare plus a very determined defender. Terrain too was critical - the Oder River flowing through the city sliced it up into many parts. Taking a major sector of the city could mean nothing more than occupying an "island" in the end.

—description from the publisher

Name: Golden Journal Number 42 Midway: Battleship-Carriers
Description:
Japanese Navy considered a radical plan to replenish and increase its carrier fleet: convert all ten of its older battleships to aircraft carriers. That would be scaled back to just the hybrid conversions of Ise and Hyuga, but not in the Golden Journal.

Meanwhile, the Americans drafted plans of their own (which still exist) to convert the hulls of Iowa-class battleships, Alaska-class large cruisers and Baltimore-class heavy cruisers into aircraft carriers. When it became clear that plenty of Essex-class carriers would join the fleet before those conversions could be made, the project was dropped (except for the conversion of nine Cleveland-class light cruisers).

Battleship-Carriers includes 20 new “long” ship pieces, 10 of them Japanese, 10 of them American, all of them our standard, beautiful die-cut and silky-smooth tiny works of art.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Avalanche Press Gold Club Golden Journal Supplements
Series: Second World War at Sea (Avalanche Press)

Name: Second Great War at Sea: River Plate
Description:
In August 1939, the German armored cruiser Admiral Graf Spee set out from Germany for the South Atlantic Ocean. Several weeks after the German invasion of Poland, she began to attack Allied merchant shipping. British and French warships scoured the South Atlantic in search of the German cruiser.

After sinking nine merchant vessels totaling just over 50,000 tons’ displacement, Admiral Graf Spee steamed to the waters off Argentina’s River Plate estuary. Instead of more undefended shipping, she found three British cruisers. Despite the heavier guns of the German ship, Admiral Graf Spee lost the encounter and fled for the neutral port of Montevideo, where her crew scuttled the ship.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Avalanche Press Gold Club Golden Journal Supplements
Series: Second World War at Sea (Avalanche Press)

Name: Second World War at Sea: Plan Z – Fleet Air Arm
Description:
Golden Journal No. 45: Fleet Air Arm is a Plan Z variant, built around the East of Suez sheet. You get an embiggened version of the usual book plus this time 210 die-cut pieces instead of the usual 20 to 40. That is a lot of ships, including scads of Royal Navy light and escort carriers and of course the airplanes to fly off of them and some escorting cruisers and destroyers and suchlike.

For the Journal, we’ll have a set of Plan Z scenarios that give the Brits lots of flight decks and the planes for them, and go with an oversized book.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Avalanche Press Gold Club Golden Journal Supplements
Series: Second World War at Sea (Avalanche Press)

Name: Infantry Attacks: Fall of Empires – Imperial & Royal Panzers
Description:
In 1911, Lt. Gunther Burstyn, an engineer officer of the Imperial Austrian Landwehr who rejected umlauts, presented plans for a Motorgeschütz, in effect a small tank. His vehicle included caterpillar tracks and a revolving turret with a 37mm gun, and looked very modern for its time. The War Ministry declined to accept it, but we’re not limited by such thinking.

Imperial & Royal Panzers is a variant for Infantry Attacks: Fall of Empires, with the Burstyn Motorgeschütz and some other early attempts at armored vehicles like the Austro-Daimler armored car. But most of all, it gives you Austro-Hungarian tanks. In 1914.

It comes with 24 new die-cut, silky-smooth playing pieces. You also get a set of scenarios to turn these proto-panzers loose against the Russians (who do have those 76.2mm field guns, so this it’s no walkover).

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Avalanche Press Gold Club Golden Journal Supplements

Name: Neuroshima Hex! 3.0: Futboliści
Description:
During the Polish Open Championship, which took place during Portalcon (22nd January 2022), you could win the brand new Footballers mini-add-on, which contains three unique tiles.

Before the start of the game, each player may place uncovered Futbolist tiles next to their army tile stack*. Each player may place a maximum of: 1 Linebacker, 1 Defender, and 1 Attacker. If, during the game, all 3 tiles a player draws are Instant Action tiles, he may use the Player Substitution rule. If he chooses to do so, he discards one of his drawn tiles and takes 1 of any of his Football Player tiles (placed next to the pile) in its place. He then continues his turn. During the course of the game, a player may make as many Player Substitutions as he has Football Player tiles. If a Football Player tile is removed from the board, it goes to the discard pile of the player who placed it on the board. If more than one player uses Futbolists during a game, each player marks the Futbolist he plays with a spare HQ damage token.
You can still use the Unlucky Draw rule when playing with Futbolists.


    Note: You cannot use Futbolists while playing Factions: Dancer, Mephisto, Death Breath.



Przed rozpoczÄ™ciem rozgrywki, kaÅ¼dy gracz moÅ¼e umieÅ›ciÄ‡ odkryte Å¼etony Futbolistów obok stosu Å¼etonów swojej Frakcji*. KaÅ¼dy gracz moÅ¼e umieÅ›ciÄ‡ maksymalnie: 1 Liniowego, 1 ObroÅ„cÄ™ i 1 AtakujÄ…cego. JeÅ¼eli podczas rozgrywki wszystkie 3 Å¼etony, które dociÄ…gnie gracz, bÄ™dÄ… Å¼etonami Natychmiastowymi, moÅ¼e skorzystaÄ‡ z zasady Podmiany Zawodnika. JeÅ¼eli siÄ™ na niÄ… zdecyduje, odrzuca jeden z dobranych Å¼etonów, a w jego miejsce bierze 1 dowolny ze swoich Å¼etonów Futbolistów (umieszczony obok stosu). NastÄ™pnie kontynuuje swojÄ… turÄ™. W trakcie gry, gracz moÅ¼e dokonaÄ‡ tyle Podmian Zawodników, ile Å¼etonów Futbolistów posiada. JeÅ¼eli Å¼eton Futbolisty zostaje usuniÄ™ty z planszy, trafia na stos odrzuconych Å¼etonów tego gracza, który wczeÅ›niej go na tej planszy umieÅ›ciÅ‚. JeÅ¼eli wiÄ™cej niÅ¼ jeden gracz korzysta z Futbolistów w czasie rozgrywki, kaÅ¼dy oznacza FutbolistÄ™, którego zagrywa, zapasowym znacznikiem WytrzymaÅ‚oÅ›ci Sztabu.
GrajÄ…c z Futbolistami wciÄ…Å¼ moÅ¼na korzystaÄ‡ z zasady Pechowego DociÄ…gu.


    Uwaga: Nie moÅ¼na korzystaÄ‡ z Futbolistów podczas gry Frakcjami: Dancer, Mephisto, Death Breath.

Name: Reload: Capture the Flag
Description:
RELOAD: Capture the flag adds the capture the flag team royale game mode to RELOAD as well of funding based stretch goals from the Kickstarter campaign.

Included is an 8-page map Book with maps specially designed for capture the flag.

RELOAD: Capture the flag adds 4 new characters to the game: Diana, Echo, Kaiser, QWERTY & Buzz.

Name: Reload: Team Sponsor Character Pack 1
Description: This expansion adds alternate versions of all 12 characters found in RELOAD, RELOAD: RUMBLE and RELOAD: CAPTURE THE FLAG. These characters come with all new abilities and skins themed to their team sponsors.

Name: Monopoly Polska
Description: Monopoly Polska is a beautiful game designed for everyone who loves to play board games. In this edition based on the original one, the places You visit was changed to the local Poland favorite places. Those were chosen in the national vote! Invest wisely, be a tough negotiator - there is only one winner. Find your own way to get a fortune!

Name: Reload: Rumble
Description:
Adds the necessary components to increase the player count to 5 and 6 players. This expansion also introduces several new game mode including 2v2v2 Team Royale and Elimination, as well as the rules to expand the existing game modes for 5 and 6 players.
4 new characters in this expansion: Butcher, Betty Boom, Emmet, and Sora.

73 Tokens
10 Customs Action Dice
4 Character Reference cards
4 Characters miniatures
4 Fame Track sets
2 Action Reference cards
1 Map book
1 Rule book

Name: Bison Dice Game
Description:
Object: To build and protect a herd of bison.  First player to get 100 or more bison, wins.

Playing Pieces: Five spotted dice numbered 2 to 6, with a Bison replacing the "1" spot.

How to Play: The player may roll all five dice up to three times in an attempt to roll a pair of bison.  A player must first roll a pair of bison on the same roll before starting to build a herd.  Once a player has established a pair of bison, then on each subsequent turn, the player rolls all five dice once and scores each bison as a 10 and all scoring dice at face value.

Name: Gemeinsame Sache
Description:
Gemeinsame Sache is a party game for up to eight players. 
Each round, a pretty easy question is being shown (for example "A board game?". Now everybody has to secretly write down an answer which fits the most to the current question. You bet on your guess if you think many other players have written it down, too.

Everybody shows its answer the ones who have the same answer as the majority wins and gets point.

Name: Monopoly Crooked Cash
Description:
In the Monopoly Crooked Cash game things aren't always as they seem. Someone added fake cash and fake Chance cards! Luckily, Mr. Monopoly is giving players his decoder so they can find the fakes and still make a fortune.

It's a game of hidden reveals, and players get to challenge their opponents for using fakes with accusation coins. But use them wisely! You only get a few coins to play. Includes Monopoly tokens that play up the deceptive theme.

The normal rules and gameplay are streamlined to make the game fairly quick. The game ends when the last street is sold.  The player with the most money at the end - real or fake - wins.

Name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game – Nova Hero Pack
Description:
A boy, a helmet, and an intergalactic legacy! Sam Alexander isn’t just any teenager; he’s been recruited to the Nova Corps, the universe’s police force. And it’s his job to look after his family and his planet as the high-flying hero Nova!

Fantasy Flight Games is excited to announce the Nova Hero Pack for Marvel Champions: The Card Game!

This cosmic hero rockets into battle in this expansion pack, which introduces Nova as a new playable hero along with his fifteen signature cards. With a pre-built Aggression deck ready to play from the get-go, you’ll be able to tackle your enemies with Nova’s wildcard gameplay from the moment you open the box. With lots of uses for “wild” resources and some powerful, efficient event cards, Nova is a thrilling hero who can contribute to any team!

Also, for the first time, this hero pack comes with a bonus modular encounter set featuring the ridiculously sturdy Armadillo!

—description from the publisher
Families: Collectible: Living Card Game (Fantasy Flight Games)
Game: Marvel Champions – The Card Game

Name: Sriracha Dice
Description:
Sriracha Dice! Flaming Fun for Everyone! Spice up game night with this quick-playing party game for the whole family.

It comes with 5 standard red six-sided dice. You’ll also need: Score pad, pen and a Smartphone timer

Three hot rounds make up a game: 
The First Round: Hot Ones has you rolling as many ones as you can in 30 seconds.

The Second Round: Pair-A-Dice gives you one hot minute to roll two pair of the highest value you can.

The third and final round: Flamin' Fast Fives has you roll five of a kind in the fastest time.

If you total the most after all three rounds, holy smokes! You win!

Name: Match These Bones
Description:
Become an expert fossil hunter. Race to uncover 25 dinosaur skeletons and pair them with the living creatures. Is that a pterodactyl or an archaeopteryx? Cab you spot the difference between a brontosaurus and a diplodocus? Find the matching dinos as fast as you can!

On your turn, choose a card from the grid. Try to find the card that matches, Dinosaur to Dinosaur Skeleton. If you succeed, collect both cards. If you fail, both cards are flipped back over for the next player's turn. The game ends when all cards have been collected, and the player who collected the most pairs wins.

Name: Zoo King: Zoovenirs
Description:
The Zoovenirs expansion adds a new dimension of gameplay along with additional cards with new abilities. The Most Memorable Zoo award is now up for grabs, but here's the catch: this award can be won at any point during the game and moves around depending on who has the most "Zoovenirs" cards.

New cards like the Kangaroo, Manatee, and Peafowl add special advantages and new facilities like the Train Ride can really take your zoos for a ride.

Zoovenirs supports an additional player (5-player) joining in on the zoo-building fun.

Includes:

7 Animal Cards
4 Facility Cards
1 Staff Card
5 Event Cards
1 Award Card
6 Money Cards

Name: Olympus Loonacy
Description: Olympus Loonacy is a rapid fire card game in which players race to be the first to empty their hand by matching one of two images on each card in their hand with the images on the open piles in front of them. The number of piles varies depending on the number of players, and if players ever reach a moment in which no one can play, everyone draws a card and it adds it to their hand at the same time, then the game play resumes.

Name: Cartographers Heroes: Champions Mini Expansion
Description:
New heroes have joined the fray! Shuffle these 4 new heroes in with your existing hero cards and you are ready to play.

Plex, Yuvi, Hazan, and of course the Immortal Knight have come to defend the realm from monsters!

Name: Now or Never: Enemy Tile – 2021 Dice Tower Promo
Description:
Originally available as part of Pack B from the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

This adds a new enemy token to the game. It has 16 health, rolls for damage, and rewards 1 XP, 1 Crystal, and 1 villager.

Name: ArchRavels: Special Requests Promo Pack
Description:
This set of 4 promotional Special Request Cards was released in Pack B of the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

This adds the Special Request cards "The Dice Tower", "Fuzzy Math Rocks", "Everyone's Welcome", and "Tom's Hat."

Name: Streets: Dice Tower 2021 Promo Tile
Description:
This promo was originally released in the Promo Pack B for the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter.

This adds a Wild tile to the game. The Bouncing Castle gives $5 for every 2 parents in the street. After stage 2 of setup, remove 1 random "wild" tile from the stack, then shuffle this tile into the stack.

Name: Tavern Tales: Legends of Dungeon Drop – Ice Demon Promo Card
Description:
This adds an additional card to Tavern Tales: Legends of Dungeon Drop. The card is a Monster Kill type card named "Ice Demon." It gives you 2 Prestige points and takes away 2 Prestige from all others.

This card was released with the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter Campaign

Name: Dungeon Drop: Torture Trap
Description:
This adds a Torture Trap to the game. The choice is 1 hero and 2 monsters OR 2 heroes and 3 monsters.

This was released as part of the Dice Tower Kickstarter 2021 "Promo Pack C"

Name: Agrisha
Description:
Agrisha is a resource-drafting worker-placement game about expanding one's influence in a bustling fantasy port town for 2-4 players (best with 3).

Players take turns gaining influence with various factions, purchasing buildings or hiring special characters, or using special abilities from previous acquisitions.

The game takes around 2 hours to play with experienced players.  The basic game actions are simple to learn, but the variety of options can make the turns of new players take some extra time.

—description from the designer

Name: Drop Drive: The Host Promo Card
Description:
This adds an additional explore card to the game called "The Host." It allows you to take 1 specimen from the discard pile when you deliver to any planet.

This card was released in "Promo Pack C" as part of the 2021 Dice Tower Kickstarter campaign. Later available during the Tantrum House Season 8 Kickstarter campaign.

Name: Freedom Five: 2021 Dice Tower Bystander Cards
Description:
These were released as a pack of 5 promo cards for the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign. The card pack includes 5 bystanders named Ella Ampongan, Roy Cannaday, Stella Jahja, Timm Metiver, and Tom Vasel.

Each card provides unique rewards and penalties to add to your game.

Name: Beez: Bonus Cards
Description:
This set of bonus cards contains 4 special objective cards and 4 double sided honey drop cards.

Card text: "After having placed the 3 common objectives, randomly draw 1 of the special objective cards and place the honey drop cards nearby. You will need 1 honey drop card per player with side matching the color of the special objective card face up. If you play with a purple special objective, use the following honey drop cards:
-8, 4 and 2 for a 3-player game
-6 and 2 for a 2-player game.

The game is played normally with the addition of a special common objective.

Each player adds the value of their honey drop card to their total number of honey drops."

This promo pack was originally released as part of the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign "Pack C".

Name: Folklore: The Affliction – Dark Tales Expansion: Return to Spice Tower Rumor Card
Description:
A new rumor card for Folklore: The Affliction. You need Dark Tales to use this Rumor. The card has you travel to the Alchemist's Tower. You then have the choice titled "Entrance" or "Defenestration."

This promo card was released as part of the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

Name: Paris: La Cité de la Lumière – La Seine
Description:
Adds La Seine postcard to the game. You may place this postcard along one side of the board. This side becomes the Seine's riverbank. Both players score 3 points for each building they have in contact with that side of the board.

This was released in the Promo Pack D for the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

Name: Dante Alighieri: Comedia – Purgatorio
Description:
The Comedy of the Supreme Poet continues among the sorrows of sin and the beatitudes of virtue.

Players need to work together to help the Viatores, Dante Alighieri and his guide Virgilio, ascend the Mountain of Purgatory in order to atone for the highest possible number of Deadly Sins (Pride, Envy, Wrath, Sloth, Avarice, Gluttony and Lust) by playing Encounters and by applying the four Cardinal Virtues (Fortitude, Temperance, the Prudence and Justice).

Each Encounter card has a certain value, and if the sum of all cards played is above or below a certain value, all players fail collectively.  But when reaching Earthly Paradise, only the most virtuous player will be able to… reach the stars.

Name: Dinosaur World: The Dice Tower Attraction Tile
Description:
This is an additional tile that can be added to Dinosaur World. It was released as part of the 2021 Dice Tower Kickstarter campaign.

This hex is called The Dice Tower. It has an excitement value of 1. You roll the three danger dice. Take Death & matching bonus: If 0 death, take 3 excitement, if 1 death, take Any Basic DNA any Advanced DNA, if 2 death, take 1 security and 1 victory point, if 3 or more death, take 1 security and advance your Jeeple Upgrade track 1 space.

Name: The Batman Who Laughs Rising: Killer Croc Promo Card
Description:
This promo replaced the Harry Potter Hogwarts Battle promo in the Pack E for the Dice Tower 2021 Kickstarter campaign.

The card powers read as follows:

Killer Croc: You may assign one damage to Killer Croc instead of assigning it to another Hero.

Name: Deadly Dinner: Killing Woodstock
Description:
San Francisco, 1970: A quiet commune, a rock band and a tough motorcycle club are united by their love of music and mind-expanding drugs. Together they want to revive the legendary Woodstock Festival. But when the commune's guru is murdered, it's all over with Love, Peace and Happiness.

The host invites his guests to a communal dinner, where everyone assumes the role of a murder suspect. One of the guests has committed the murder, but they all have secrets they'd rather keep to themselves. Over three rounds, they try to get behind the secrets of the other players without making themselves suspects. The common goal is to solve the murder case - or get away with the bloody deed.

A game of Deadly Dinner consists of three rounds, in which each player gets new secret information about the crime. Players must discuss their information and clues as a group in order to identify the perpetrator in the end. To prepare, each player should receive their character's starting information a few days before playing the game.

—description from the publisher

Name: Architecten van het Westelijk Koninkrijk: Promodeck
Description:
Promo deck which contains:

     Architects of the West Kingdom: Garphill Games 5-Year Anniversary Promo Cards)
     Architects of the West Kingdom: Promo Paradise Card Set
     Architects of the West Kingdom: Racketeer
     Architects of the West Kingdom: King's Table Top


12 cards + 1 card with rules

Name: Golden Annual Number 1: Infantry Attacks – Black Mountain
Description:
Infantry Attacks: Black Mountain is based on the 1914 Austro-Hungarian campaign against the tiny but belligerent kingdom of Montenegro. The Austrian mountain brigades had the advantages of numbers and firepower, but fierce Montenegrin resistance kept the kingdom unconquered until January 1916.

Infantry Attacks: Black Mountain includes 88 die-cut and silky-smooth playing pieces, including Austro-Hungarian and Montenegrin troops, leaders and weapons plus the markers needed for play. There’s an 11x17-inch map (on heavy rigid stock just like the other Infantry Attacks or Panzer Grenadier games), and a booklet with ten scenarios and historical background for the campaign.

—description from the publisher
Families: Series: Avalanche Press Gold Club Golden Journal Supplements

Name: A Crowning Glory: Austerlitz 1805
Description:
Even weeks before Trafalgar, by August 1805 the newly crowned Emperor Napoleon Ier, had come to understand his plans required action on land. More specifically, he had to defeat his continental enemies in order to secure his continued power. Britain, Russia and Austria were allied against him and, since he couldn’t get at the British on their island fortress, and Russia was too far away to allow for the required quick victory, he was left with invading Austria.

Rapidly surrounding and capturing the main Austrian Army at Ulm, December found Napoleon at Austerlitz (modern day Skavkov u Brna) in southern Moravia at the end of a very stretched supply line. He also appeared to be slightly outnumbered by an Coalition army made up of the remnants of Austrian forces, plus a sizable Russian contingent. Feigning weakness, Napoleon lured the Coalition force into attacking his right flank (where he wanted them to), then counterpunched through the Coalition center to encircle most of them. The Coalition were crushed, and through the victory, Napoleon cemented his hold on the throne. It was a crowning glory.

This two-player grand-tactical simulation by Ty Bomba presents the battle generally considered to have been Napoleon’s greatest victory. Both players have the opportunity to attack and defend, but the main burden of the offensive resides with the French player. His opponent, the Allied player, commands the Austrian and Russian units. Each hexagon on the map represents 600 yards (549 meters) from side to opposite side. The units are brigades and divisions. Each full turn represents one hour of ‘real time.’

Published in Against The Odds #57

—description from the publisher

Name: Kampf gegen das Spiessertum: Travel Edition
Description:
"A party game for horrible German people"

Play begins with a judge, known as the "Round Boss", choosing a red fill-in-the-blank card from the top of the deck and showing it to all players. Each player holds a hand of eight white answer cards at the beginning of each round, and passes a card (sometimes more) to the round boss, face-down, representing their answer to the question on the card. The round boss determines which answer card(s) are funniest in the context of the fill-in-the-blank card. The player who submitted the chosen card(s) is given the question card to represent a point, and then the player to the left of the Round Boss becomes the new Boss for the next round. Play continues until the players agree to stop, or until they are thrown out of the pub, at which point the player with the most Points is the winner.

Kampf gegen das Spießertum: Travel Edition contains 400 brand-new Cards. 100 yellow and 300 white cards are enough to play with friends. Or mix it together with Kampf gegen das Spießertum and/or the expansions.

It features all new cards with German celebrities, places and topics of interest.

Name: Hoops!: Basketball League
Description:
Hoops! Basketball League is a dynasty building card game where 2-5 new team owners compete to win the inaugural and coveted Hoops! Championship Trophy.

Owners will spend their weeks preparing for their upcoming games by bolstering their roster, improving their stadiums, Raising funds, getting in some last minute training, or seeking to sabotage their rivals.

Games will occur at the end of each week where owners will roll die to discover just how well their players performed against their foes. Calculate the scores and determine a winner. The first franchise with seven wins will be declared champion!

Name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Baratheon Attachments I
Description:
With the death of Robert Baratheon, many have put in claims to be the next rightful person to sit on the Iron Throne. For House Baratheon, two people have made that claim. Both of Robert’s brothers, Stannis and Renly, have each decided it is their turn to rule. This has torn House Baratheon in two as half has thrown in with Stannis while the other half backs Renly. With House Baratheon’s great resources, each still has a chance to be the next to rule from King’s Landing.

The Baratheon Attachments #1 box set for the A Song of Ice and Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game gives House Baratheon players a host of new options when they’re building their armies, whether it’s for Stannis or Renly. Some of the Unit Attachments will work for both brothers, while others can only be added to particular forces. Either way, these new options will bolster House Baratheon’s already well-equipped troops, making their armor tougher, their speed faster, or letting them last even longer on the battlefield.

—description from the publisher
Families: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players

Name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Frozen Shores Chariots
Description:
The Free Folk Ride Into Battle

Those that live south of the Wall think that the Wildings living beyond it are nothing but primitive savages, not capable of utilizing any kind of advanced engineering in combat. That is, however, very much not the case. While their Frozen Shore Chariots aren’t the most sturdy of constructs, they work well enough to usher those bold enough to ride them into battle. More than capable of bashing their way through enemy ranks due to sheer mass and speed alone, these engines of war are a formidable foe to face.

The Frozen Shore Chariot Box Set gives Free Folk Players in the A Song of Ice and Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game a new warmachine for their army. Like cavalry models, this unit can make a free Maneuver Action at the start of its activation, letting it get into position for one of its deadly charges. They hit like an avalanche, getting extra power and taking out concentrated enemy units with ease.

—description from the publisher
Families: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
Game: A Song of Ice & Fire – Tabletop Miniatures Game
Players: Wargames with Rules Supporting Only Two Players
